title: LUX Is secretly TARIC
body:
http://imgur.com/gDSujUQ

Well that can explain why Ezreal is Confused.

replies.body: Psssr Memes and Games is where this goes
put it in gameplay

Put it in Memes and Games.
Mods delete it and say it is supposed to be in Gameplay.
Put it in Gameplay.
Mods delete it and say it is supposed to be in Story and Art.
Put it in Story and Art.
Mods delete it and say it is supposed to be in Miscellaneous.
Put it in Miscellaneous.
Mods delete it and say it is supposed to be in Dev Corner.
Somehow magically put it in Dev Corners.
Mods delete it and say it is supposed to be carved onto the White House.
Carves it onto the White House.
Mods delete it and say it is supposed to be in Memes and Games.

Even though they don't do that? 
Never seen or heard of mods deleting good posts left and right especially when they're posted on the right section.
Well, deleting from section A and telling to post in B to then delete from B and telling to post in A has definitely happened in the past.

>Well, deleting from section A and telling to post in B to then delete from B and telling to post in A has definitely happened in the past.

I can confirm the truth in this.
Psssr

Lux x Taric confirmed

Sorry Ez
Why not Lux x Taric x Ez? Who said we can only ship two people? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
You mean Taric x Taric?

> [{quoted}](name=Mecha MaIphite,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=UYrmf4ay,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2017-02-07T23:13:00.631+0000)
>
> You mean Taric x Taric?

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
So if we shipped rengar with himself it would be Hunter x Hunter?
Bahahaha

By posting this in miscellaneous you're denying a valuable post from M&G fyi.
I still think the post is funny though X3

> [{quoted}](name=LostFr0st,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=UYrmf4ay,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-07T14:15:03.177+0000)
>
> By posting this in miscellaneous you're denying a valuable post from M&G fyi.
> I still think the post is funny though X3

I never know where to post anything.

The joke is that not even moderators know that.

That's why a meme thread can be removed from Memes and Games, while posting memes or straight shitposting in Gameplay and Balance is completely fine.

I'm joking of course ^^"
'tis a fine post OP.  It made me smile.

Moderation and guidelines on the Boards are so fucked up you can basically post anything anywhere.

Oh, how I miss attending forums with unequivocal rules and sub-section guidelines.

You know, where "no swearing" meant "no swearing" not "you can swear as long as it's not sexually explicit _or some other bullshit with unclear definition_".
I'm joking.^^"  Apparently miscellaneous posters are hard-core.

It may be a joke, but it's important.

Moderation is a pile of dung suffering from an SJW agenda and political correctness.

Just a moment ago had my comment removed because it apparently contained the name of genre of anime beginning with "H" used in the context of the "I've seen enough H to know where this is going" meme.
Because it's mature content.

I swear the western world lost it's mind.

Hell, merely writing this can get me banned.

I'd know, I've been punished on the Boards for less.
Somebodies being a bit melodramatic.

>Somebody's being a bit melodramatic.

Are you sure?
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/Z88lmkul-psa-rito-dont-play-about-account-sharing

that post does not apply, for a lot of reasons.

reason one, It is about riot responding to something that riot has been very clear about having 0 tolerance for.

reason two, It is not about anything of poor taste neither does it contain an obscene amount of obscenity.

Reason Three, It does not mention SJW at all, and does not try to paint a slanderous term onto anyone.

Reason Four, The op of that post is not stating that they could be banned for posting their post.

Reason Five, The op of that post is not blaming "the western world"

Reason six, The op of that post is not blaming "political correctness"

Reason Seven, The op of that post is not saying that riot should act differently.

Reason Eight, the op of that post did not insinuate that a post could go to any board because the boards are fucked up.

Reason Nine, The op of that post never insinuated that the boards were bad.

Reason Ten, The op of that post never said that the rules were unclear


Thusly, that post you showed does not show anything that pertains to this argument. It is about someone get messaged about being banned for a reason that is very clear, when this guy is stating that the rules are unclear and abused.

good attempt, but you should work on your reading and understanding skills, rather than try and attach your own meaning to things.

_Speaking of overreaction to a joke..._

Statement:
>Moderation is a pile of dung suffering from an SJW agenda and political correctness.

Response:
>Somebodies being a bit melodramatic.

Statement:
A person had his post removed and received a ban-threat from a moderator over something that obviously was a joke.

Is complaining about this melodramatic as well? Usually there is a clear difference between a melodrama and a well-argued presentation of an objection...but sometimes, what is being perceived by someone as melodramatic is in fact nothing short of a cold, hard truth.

Should you desire to cling to the former, that's your prerogative. Much the same as it's mine to stick to the latter.

As for the understanding - if that's the game you want to play - there is work to be done on your grammar.
It stops being melodramatic and starts being outright idiotic when you get banned for posting a meme with the word "fap", while the next guy was throwing fucks left and right and nobody even blinked.

I was referring to you, btw.

crying about "the injustice of the world" is just as shit coming from a pro sjw and an anti sjw.

The idea is that SJW don't use logic in their argumentation and are full of hypocrisy.

I've witnessed multiple times where somebody had their post removed for details, while the person swearing in the next post was having the time of their life.

I'm not an SJW or whatever an "anti-SJW" is.

I'm pointing out obvious idiocy and double standards.

>Hell, merely writing this can get me banned.

>I'd know, I've been punished on the Boards for less.

Yup, totally talking about double standards, not crying about stupid shit.

Can't even stick to your guns, probably need to work on either confidence or better yet, learning how to accept when you've been called out.

Pretty sure the H was removed because some kid might stumble upon it tbh.
Imagine the look on a 10yr old's face XD
^ Please tell me you find that amusing too...

They did go over the rules recently to clarify them at least;
but alas the boards are still in Beta <---a meme of its own.

They usually don't remove stuff unless it's very over the line or it gets
reported by someone though from what I've seen.

>Pretty sure the H was removed because some kid might stumble upon it tbh.
Imagine the look on a 10yr old's face XD

At this point we should remove mentions of humans, because you need to pull down your pants to defecate.

Let's ban going outside, because kids may injure themselves and see BLOOD!

_\*gasp\*_

>Please tell me you find that amusing too...

No, it was too bearable to be amusing. You should ask Diana to give you a few pointers.

>They did go over the rules recently to clarify them at least;

You mean this mess is what the settled on after clarifying whatever was there before?
This just adds insult to the injury.
IIRC it had something to do with Memes and Games only if at all.

>They usually don't remove stuff unless it's very over the line 

Ohoho. You have _no_ idea, son.

> [{quoted}](name=Sraeg2013,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=UYrmf4ay,comment-id=000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-02-08T01:24:04.742+0000)
>
> Imagine the look on a 10yr old's face XD
> 
> At this point we should remove mentions of humans, because you need to pull down your pants to defecate.
> 
> Let's ban going outside, because kids may injure themselves and see BLOOD!
> 
> _\*gasp\*_

That feel when you write this and they halved the yard size at my elementary school when they rebuilt it years after I graduated... They even fenced off the rocky outcrop...
> 
> No, it was too bearable to be amusing. You should ask Diana to give you a few pointers.

c'mon man... I tried.  It's not my fault Diana has a better sense of humour...
> 
> You mean this mess is what the settled on after clarifying whatever was there before?
> This just adds insult to the injury.
> IIRC it had something to do with Memes and Games only if at all.

^Yeah pretty sure you're right on that bit.
> 
> Ohoho. You have _no_ idea, son.

Apparently not.
I think I've only had a couple posts removed ever, 
and that was for copy-pasta posting while responding to the fix for a bug or something that was running rampant last summer??  ...I think.
I'm Canadian so we usually don't try to step too heavily around the border.
We just kinda exist and walk around apologizing really^^"

>That feel when you write this and they halved the yard size at my elementary school when they rebuilt it years after I graduated... They even fenced off the rocky outcrop...

Bah, my middle school used to be locked for the duration of classes and if you wanted to officially leave before then, you had to show a pass at the door.
After two years they said, screw it and stopped locking the school.
I guess having to replace windowsills and windows every so often made them reconsider.

>c'mon man... I tried. It's not my fault Diana has a **better** sense of humour...

You mispelled "worse".

> Apparently not.
> I think I've only had a couple posts removed ever,
> and that was for copy-pasta posting while responding to the fix for a bug or something that was running rampant last summer?? ...I think.
> I'm Canadian so we usually don't try to step too heavily around the border.
> We just kinda exist and walk around apologizing really^^"

Nothing feels better than getting a week long ban for posting a gif of an anime girl that was already used dozens of times and nobody was punished for it.

> [{quoted}](name=Sraeg2013,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=UYrmf4ay,comment-id=00000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-08T14:46:41.471+0000)
>
> Bah, my middle school used to be locked for the duration of classes and if you wanted to officially leave before then, you had to show a pass at the door.
> After two years they said, screw it and stopped locking the school.
> I guess having to replace windowsills and windows every so often made them reconsider.

O.O hmmm.  I guess that would be an incentive.  Mine was in the middle of nowhere so there were only trees, rocks, and grass around.  They basically let us out to graze rofl.
> 
> You mispelled "worse".

:3
> 
> Nothing feels better than getting a week long ban for posting a gif of an anime girl that was already used dozens of times and nobody was punished for it.

Ok then... I definitely see your point.  They prob didn't lift it either right?

>O.O hmmm. I guess that would be an incentive. Mine was in the middle of nowhere so there were only trees, rocks, and grass around. They basically let us out to graze rofl.

Well, mine is somewhere close to the center of the city (relatively small one, 60k people) and there is a supermarket a stone's throw away.

>Ok then... I definitely see your point. They prob didn't lift it either right?

There was nothing to lift.
It ended about a week before they responded.

> [{quoted}](name=Sraeg2013,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=UYrmf4ay,comment-id=0000000000000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-08T16:48:10.540+0000)

... wow   just wow.

> [{quoted}](name=LostFr0st,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=UYrmf4ay,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-07T14:15:03.177+0000)
>
> By posting this in miscellaneous you're denying a valuable post from M&G fyi.
> I still think the post is funny though X3

Oh i seriously cant tell on here. Im sorry lol.

It's my bad.  I should have put /s at the bottom.

I also can't take you seriously with that summoner name.
The Darius reaction face that pops into my mind as if you were shouting that to him in a crowd amuses me to no end.

Star guardian Lux is secretly Armor of the Fifth Age Taric.

They both fire lasers even.
Wow they both wear similar colors of green, must be the same.
And also the pose, glowing effects, and leaves on their shoulders.

Lux is just Taric as a drag queen

Honestly make a drag queen taric skin and give it lux' model
https://media.giphy.com/media/EldfH1VJdbrwY/giphy.gif
Holy shit!
What has been seen cannot be unseen.
